resources.string: Enter car plate number, e.g. HWA9999
Enter additional details to include in complaint (optional)
Kuala Lumpur, Johor Baru, Kuala Terengganu, Melaka

Government Departments: LPKP, SPAD, JPJ, KPDNKK

 Consumer Groups: TRANSIT, NCCC

 Government Ministers: Minister of Transport, Prime Minister

 News Media: The Star, Star Metro, Malay Mail, New Straits Times, New Straits Times Streets, The Sun, Malaysia Kini, The Malaysian Insider

 Traffic Police: rmp@rmp.gov.my

RM4 for first km
 10 cents for each additional 115 meters
 OR
 RM4 for first 3 minutes
 10 cents for each additional 21 seconds


Additional Charges:
 50% surcharge between midnight and 6:00AM
 RM2 for telephone bookings
 RM1 for 3rd adult passenger (max 4) and/or baggage stored in boot
 Actual road toll charges


http://www.spad.gov.my/downloads/forms/Peninsular_Malaysia_Public_Transport_Fare_Rate_Table.pdf

RM3 for first km
 10 cents for each additional 115 meters
 OR
 RM3 for first 3 minutes
 10 cents for each additional 21 seconds


Additional Charges:
 50% surcharge between midnight and 6:00AM
 RM2 for telephone bookings
 RM1 for 3rd adult passenger (max 4) and/or baggage stored in boot
 Actual road toll charges


See http://www.spad.gov.my/downloads/forms/Peninsular_Malaysia_Public_Transport_Fare_Rate_Table.pdf
